name: Dungeons & Brooms HD
description:
Sweep the dungeons by avoiding or destroying your enemies.

Look for gold, armor and potions. Go through the levels and make your best score.

How long can you resist?

Download now and check it out!

Controls:

  • Left Click: Reveal a block
  • Right Click: Destroy a block
  • Drag the mouse: Move the camera

______________________________
Recommended Settings:

  • Windows 7
  • 1.0 Ghz Dual Core CPU
  • 1GB of RAM
  • A DirectX 9 (or later) compatible graphics card
